content:
Beer Festival Package

Book your lodging and get a one day general admission ticket with this package. The 26th Annual Great Brews Beer Festival will feature live musical entertainment, giveaways, delicious food, and of course, BEER! Don't forget the backyard games, including giant beer pong, giant jenga, cornhole, and more! With bold flavors, crisp hard ciders, smooth stouts, hoppy IPAs, fruitty and pale ales, and even Sour Sundays there's a beer for everyone's tastes!

VIEW MORE DETAILS
